name: Mirages
description:
March three, the gate of hell opens!

Mirages is a 3D side-scrolling narrative and horror game on the subject of traditional folklore. The whole story happens in a small town called Yichuan in the Republic of China. The town is controlled by Feudal Superstition System as well as warlords. Risks lurk under peace.
The city that actually is the phantom of the underworld and ghosts appears after a strange and unexpected marriage. Since then, the balance between Yin and Yang was broken, leaving a chaoed town. Yao Lu, a descendent of the Street Keeper of Yichuan, and also is a guide between the town and the underworld. So he starts to investigate the unusual situation.
Destinies are entangled. Characters are engaged in this crisis. While they are making the truth clear and clear, a bigger conspiracy is about to surface.

Rich branches and double endings/h2]

There are a number of plot branches in the game. With many event details, players get to piece together the background of the game and the truth behind the crisis, experiencing two different endings. Your every choice can slowly and unwarily influence the destinies of characters. Immerse in the perspectives of characters. Experience their growth, fight, hope, and redemption.

Dub and animate to present a show from different perspectives of characters.

Full-process dubbing, 3D scene, and animation strongly present strange folklore with the features of the Republic of China. In the immersive, treacherous, and horrible atmosphere, you could enjoy a great show from different perspectives of characters.

Restore Chinese-style horror by traditional culture.

Corpse-walking, psychic, ghost marriage, sacrifice, and puppetry. Integrated all those elements of traditional Chinese hell culture, and exquisite writing both in classical Chinese and vernacular, the game creates the most horrible atmosphere with Chinese style in a narrative way, letting players immersive in the era of the Republic of China and find the truth.

Ghosts emerge. The gameplay of puzzling and stealth.

In the strange adventure, from time to time, players are involved in a dangerous situation with devils. Gameplays are added, including puzzling, QTE actions, and stealth. Enjoy the horrible atmosphere and thrilling adventure! Be careful! The future is unpredictable, and you might suddenly start to cold sweat!
